org.apache.beam.runners.direct

Class ConsumerTrackingPipelineVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.Pipeline.PipelineVisitor.Defaults
      • org.apache.beam.runners.direct.ConsumerTrackingPipelineVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pipeline.PipelineVisitor

    public class ConsumerTrackingPipelineVisitor
extends Pipeline.PipelineVisitor.Defaults
    Tracks the AppliedPTransforms that consume each PValue in the Pipeline. This is used to schedule consuming PTransforms to consume input after the upstream transform has produced and committed output.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.beam.sdk.Pipeline.PipelineVisitor

        Pipeline.PipelineVisitor.CompositeBehavior, Pipeline.PipelineVisitor.Defaults

    • Method Detail

      • enterCompositeTransform

        public Pipeline.PipelineVisitor.CompositeBehavior enterCompositeTransform(TransformTreeNode node)
        Description copied from interface: Pipeline.PipelineVisitor
        Called for each composite transform after all topological predecessors have been visited but before any of its component transforms.

        The return value controls whether or not child transforms are visited.

        Specified by:
        enterCompositeTransform in interface Pipeline.PipelineVisitor
        Overrides:
        enterCompositeTransform in class Pipeline.PipelineVisitor.Defaults

      • leaveCompositeTransform

        Description copied from interface: Pipeline.PipelineVisitor

      • getValueToConsumers

        public Map<PValue,Collection<AppliedPTransform<?,?,?>>> getValueToConsumers()
        Returns a mapping of each fully-expanded PValue to each AppliedPTransform that consumes it. For each AppliedPTransform in the collection returned from getValueToCustomers().get(PValue), AppliedPTransform#getInput().expand() will contain the argument PValue.

      • getStepNames

        public Map<AppliedPTransform<?,?,?>,String> getStepNames()
        Returns the mapping for each AppliedPTransform in the Pipeline to a unique step name.

      • getRootTransforms

        public Collection<AppliedPTransform<?,?,?>> getRootTransforms()
        Returns the root transforms of the Pipeline. A root AppliedPTransform consumes a PInput where the PInput.expand() returns an empty collection.

      • getViews

        public Collection<PCollectionView<?>> getViews()
        Returns all of the PCollectionViews contained in the visited Pipeline.

      • getUnfinalizedPValues

        public Set<PValue> getUnfinalizedPValues()
        Returns all of the PValues that have been produced but not consumed. These PValues should be finalized by the PipelineRunner before the Pipeline is executed.
